description: Retrieves information about a data store.

parameters.name: datastoreName
parameters.description: The name of the data store.

nested_items.name: datastore
nested_items.description: Information about the data store.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the data store.

nested_items.name: serviceManagedS3
nested_items.description: Used to store data in an Amazon S3 bucket managed by IoT Analytics. You can't change the choice of Amazon S3 storage after your data store is created.

nested_items.name: customerManagedS3
nested_items.description: S3-customer-managed; When you choose customer-managed storage, the retentionPeriod parameter is ignored. You can't change the choice of Amazon S3 storage after your data store is created.

nested_items.name: bucket
nested_items.description: The name of the Amazon S3 bucket where your data is stored.

nested_items.name: keyPrefix
nested_items.description: (Optional) The prefix used to create the keys of the data store data objects. Each object in an Amazon S3 bucket has a key that is its unique identifier in the bucket. Each object in a bucket has exactly one key. The prefix must end with a forward slash (/).

nested_items.name: roleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the role that grants IoT Analytics permission to interact with your Amazon S3 resources.

nested_items.name: iotSiteWiseMultiLayerStorage
nested_items.description: Used to store data used by IoT SiteWise in an Amazon S3 bucket that you manage. You can't change the choice of Amazon S3 storage after your data store is created.

nested_items.name: customerManagedS3Storage
nested_items.description: Used to store data used by IoT SiteWise in an Amazon S3 bucket that you manage.

nested_items.name: bucket
nested_items.description: The name of the Amazon S3 bucket where your data is stored.

nested_items.name: keyPrefix
nested_items.description: (Optional) The prefix used to create the keys of the data store data objects. Each object in an Amazon S3 bucket has a key that is its unique identifier in the bucket. Each object in a bucket has exactly one key. The prefix must end with a forward slash (/).

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the data store.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of a data store:

nested_items.name: retentionPeriod
nested_items.description: How long, in days, message data is kept for the data store. When customerManagedS3 storage is selected, this parameter is ignored.

nested_items.name: unlimited
nested_items.description: If true, message data is kept indefinitely.

nested_items.name: numberOfDays
nested_items.description: The number of days that message data is kept. The unlimited parameter must be false.

nested_items.name: creationTime
nested_items.description: When the data store was created.

nested_items.name: lastUpdateTime
nested_items.description: The last time the data store was updated.

nested_items.name: lastMessageArrivalTime
nested_items.description: The last time when a new message arrived in the data store.

nested_items.name: fileFormatConfiguration
nested_items.description: Contains the configuration information of file formats. IoT Analytics data stores support JSON and Parquet.

nested_items.name: jsonConfiguration
nested_items.description: Contains the configuration information of the JSON format.

nested_items.name: parquetConfiguration
nested_items.description: Contains the configuration information of the Parquet format.

nested_items.name: schemaDefinition
nested_items.description: Information needed to define a schema.

nested_items.name: columns
nested_items.description: Specifies one or more columns that store your data.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the column.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of data. For more information about the supported data types, see Common data types in the Glue Developer Guide.

nested_items.name: datastorePartitions
nested_items.description: Contains information about the partition dimensions in a data store.

nested_items.name: partitions
nested_items.description: A list of partition dimensions in a data store.

nested_items.name: attributePartition
nested_items.description: A partition dimension defined by an attributeName.

nested_items.name: attributeName
nested_items.description: The name of the attribute that defines a partition dimension.

nested_items.name: timestampPartition
nested_items.description: A partition dimension defined by a timestamp attribute.

nested_items.name: attributeName
nested_items.description: The attribute name of the partition defined by a timestamp.

nested_items.name: timestampFormat
nested_items.description: The timestamp format of a partition defined by a timestamp. The default format is seconds since epoch (January 1, 1970 at midnight UTC time).

nested_items.name: statistics
nested_items.description: Additional statistical information about the data store. Included if the includeStatistics parameter is set to true in the request.

nested_items.name: estimatedSizeInBytes
nested_items.description: The estimated size of the resource, in bytes.

nested_items.name: estimatedOn
nested_items.description: The time when the estimate of the size of the resource was made.
